titles.title: White House is Not a Political Prop Act
White House is Not a Political Prop Act
White House is Not a Political Prop Act
To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit any individual from holding certain political campaign or fundraising events on Federal property, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
